message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer! While I believe this product could be valuable for me, $12,000 is a bit steep.  Would you consider $8,000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $8,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a bit.  $10,500 is still a little high for my budget though.  Could you do $9,250?

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. However, $9,250 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make another concession, so I'm counteroffering at $10,000. I think this is a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you.
